name: Amunets Server Transfer
description:
A server cluster solution for conan - kinda.

This mod allows switching "on the fly" between servers (and taking your character with you).
changeNote:
2020-12-04 - 1.0.3
- follow the rules; RCON now respects the 4096 byte limit.
- updated cluster.php and rcon.php to handle multi part messages correctly.
author: LilMissHentai
